title: Hire Me
intro:
I’m really good at what I do. But you can’t know that yet. So... let’s work together in a fresh way that doesn’t require a leap of faith.

[Email me](mailto:mister@patgriffith.com) and we’ll start for free. Then, if and only if we’re a good fit, we can talk about billing montly, per project (pre-defined scope), or on commission (eg setting financial rewards for certain KPIs).
